content: a simple pattern for a mini mini sock fantastic for a mini mini bloker as a key tag or christmas tree tag mini mini bloker you will find on my website **size** one size **needles** 2 0 and 2 25 mm / us 0 and us 1 **gauge information** 40 sts x 40 row in 10 cm in the rounds any sock yarn / fingering weight yarn 400m/100g or sock yarn 210m/100g
